Video: How we run a school tour (what to look for)

A video walkthrough of what to pay attention to during a school visit: classroom feel, support, and commute reality.

#video#schools#tours#parents
Pillar: Schools & learning: how to choose a fit

Written answer (always comes first)

This page demonstrates the Video Block standard:

  • The written answer is on-page (SEO + accessibility)
  • The video is supporting context
  • We include a transcript (or a detailed recap)
  • A clear, gentle next-step CTA lives under the video

What to look for on a tour

  • Classroom energy and teacher attention
  • Support systems (how help happens day-to-day)
  • Supervision and safety routines
  • Parent communication
  • Commute reality at real times

Related

  • Tour checklist resource
  • School tour guide
